effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion. If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion. This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage. Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion. If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion. This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion. If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion. This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
